title: Zero-shot Large Language Models for Long Clinical Text Summarization with Temporal Reasoning
details: M Kruse, S Hu, N Derby, Y Wu, S Stonbraker, B Yao… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Recent advancements in large language models (LLMs) have shown potential for transforming data processing in healthcare, particularly in understanding complex clinical narratives. This study evaluates the efficacy of zero-shot LLMs in …
